Blackstorm:::

"Problem is that... It seems that every one are treating me as if I 
couldn't take care for myself "replied Blackstorm"Sure... but, some 
times I feel that they don't trust that I can be a fierce 
Predacon... I guess that I'll show them that I can do it when I kill 
a Maximal"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Hevn::
>        "Is that a problem m'lady?"  He looks up at her with a coy 
grin.  "I 
> am what I am, and that's ... ahem ... nevermind that."  He finally 
get 
> serious and puts his arms on the table and sits up straight 
looking directly 
> into Blackstorm's eyes.  "Tell me something, are you happy here?  
Is this 
> where you want to be?"
